TopicTitle: Is there a way to show proof of purchase?

Articles.Content: So as about 0.1% of you probably know, KSP 0.90 cannot be obtained anywhere (unless I'm missing something) and I want to bring it back. The problem is, even though I have the .zip file, I don't want to just hand out old versions of KSP for free because that would be illegal. If there's a way to show proof of purchase, I could set up a distribution page that requires it and then allows a download of 0.90. Infinigliders are awesome!
With or without proof of purchase, distributing commercial copies of the game will land you in hot water.

1 minute ago, Alshain said:

With or without proof of purchase, distributing commercial copies of the game will land you in hot water.

Good to know. Maybe I can convince Squad to put 0.90 downloads back up on the website/steam
